hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.KF Midos Bottom Left Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

hinted_items: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)
